mapper.select: select article.article_id as articleId, article.article_title as articleTitle, article.gmt_create as publishTime, (select count(*) as commentNumber from comment where comment.article_id = user_article.article_id) as replayNumber from user_article, article where user_article.user_id = #{userId} and article.article_id = user_article.article_id;

select article_id, article_title, article_content, gmt_create from article where gmt_create <= (select gmt_create from ( select article_id, gmt_create from article where article_id < #{endArticleId} order by gmt_create desc limit 1) as tmp) AND article_id < #{endArticleId} ORDER BY article_id desc limit 10;
select article_id from article order by article_id desc limit 1;
select from article where article_id in (SELECT article_id from (select comment.article_id from `comment` group by comment.article_id ORDER BY count(*) desc limit 20) as tmp);
select user_article.user_id from article, user_article where article.article_id = #{articleId} and article.article_id = user_article.article_id;
